description: This Dart source file defines the 'YahooFinanceService' class, which provides methods to fetch real-time stock quotes from Yahoo Finance using public endpoints. It includes functions for fetching multiple stock quotes, fallback mechanisms, and parsing the response data into 'Stock' model instances.

classes.name: YahooFinanceService
classes.description: A service class to retrieve stock quotes from Yahoo Finance using public APIs, with fallback and response parsing mechanisms.

methods.name: fetchQuotes
methods.description: Fetches multiple stock quotes for a list of symbols, attempts primary API, falls back to secondary if needed.

methods.name: _fetchFallback
methods.description: Fetches stock quotes from fallback Yahoo Finance endpoint when primary fails.

methods.name: _parseQuoteResponse
methods.description: Parses the JSON response body into a list of Stock objects, applying heuristic signal and scoring.

methods.name: fetchSingle
methods.description: Fetches a single Stock quote based on the provided symbol.
